  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>

    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:melt.cup.cam.ac.uk:cahi1:data_86908</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_86908</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="fr">L'âge des couches de roches 1</string>
            <string language="en">The age of rock layers 1</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Das Alter von Felsenschichten 1</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A idade das camadas 1 da rocha</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">L'età degli strati 1 della roccia</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η ηλικία των στρωμάτων 1 βράχου</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">La edad de las capas 1 de la roca</string>
          </title>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <description>
            <string language="fr">Première sur deux illustrations qui montre que les  couches les plus anciennes de roche sédimentaire sont au bas,  alors que les plus jeunes couches sont sur le dessus.</string>
            <string language="en">First of two illustrations which shows that the oldest layers of sedimentary rock are at the bottom, while the youngest layers are on the top.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">Âge</string>
            <string language="en">Age</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">couches</string>
            <string language="en">layers</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">mers</string>
            <string language="en">seas</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">roches sédimentaires</string>
            <string language="en">sedimentary rocks</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">sédiments</string>
            <string language="en">sediments</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Zuerst von zwei Abbildungen, die zeigt, daß die 
ältesten Schichten des sedimentären Felsens an der Unterseite sind, 
während die jüngsten Schichten auf die Oberseite sind.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Primeiramente de duas ilustrações que mostra 
que as camadas as mais velhas de rocha sedimentary estão no fundo, 
quando as camadas as mais novas estiverem no alto.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">In primo luogo di due illustrazioni che indica 
che i più vecchi strati della roccia sedimentaria sono alla parte 
inferiore, mentre gli strati più giovani sono sulla parte superiore.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πρώτα δύο απεικονίσεων που δείχνει ότι τα παλαιότερα
στρώματα του ιζηματώδους βράχου είναι στο κατώτατο σημείο, ενώ 
τα νεώτερα στρώματα είναι στην κορυφή.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Primero de dos ilustraciones que muestra que las 
más viejas capas de la roca sedimentaria están en el fondo, mientras
que las capas más jóvenes están en la tapa.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Alter</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Schichten</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Meere</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">sedimentäre Felsen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sedimente</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Idade</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">camadas</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">mares</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">rochas sedimentary</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Età</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">strati</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
